duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive industry and company coverage for institutional and individual clients.
Work with Senior Analysts on quantitative support for research and financial models.
Collect industry data and provide expertise in a specific sector to support client investment decisions.
Develop proprietary research and distribute it to clients.
Write reports, communicate findings, and attend company-sponsored conferences.
Interact with covered company management and discuss research findings with associates and institutional clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required, graduation date of December 2023 or Spring 2024. Finance/Accounting degree strongly preferred. Candidates must have a track record of proven academic excellence. CFA designation is required.
